sen.j: 十六世 喜多 六平太（じゅうろくせ きた ろっぺいた、1924年（大正13年）12月6日 -）とは、シテ方喜多流能楽師。
sen.e: The 16th Roppeita KITA (December 6, 1924 to -), is a Noh actor of the shite-kata Kita school (one of the five schools of shite-kata [main roles]).
The 16th Roppeita KITA (December 6, 1924 to -), is a Noh actor of the shite-kata Kita school (one of the five schools of shite-kata [main roles]).

The 16th head of the leading family in the Kita school.

sen.j: 祖父喜多六平太 (14世)、父に師事。
sen.e: He learned from his grandfather, Roppeita Kita (14th) and his father.
